Class MoveRegionTool

extends DraggableControl

    Tool/control for repositioning page content objects.

    clc

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoveRegionTool

        public MoveRegionTool(java.lang.String imageUrl,
              SelectionManager selectionManager,
              PageSyncManager pageSync,
              boolean alwaysRefreshPageView,
              boolean fillWholeRegion)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        imageUrl - Icon resource
        selectionManager - Content object selection manager to add a listener
        pageSync - Synchronisation manager for sending the changed outline to the server
        alwaysRefreshPageView - If set to false the view is only refreshed when the user releases the mouse button, otherwise it is refreshed as well when moving the mouse.
